Package com.bfo.netkeystore.client

Interface OAuth2.RedirectURLHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
OAuth2.SimpleRedirectURLHandler
Enclosing class:
OAuth2
public static interface OAuth2.RedirectURLHandler
The interface required for an OAuth2 "authorization" flow that requires a callback from the server

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Map<String,Object>
    handleRedirect(OAuth2 oauth2, String url)
    Initialize a callback, which will require the user to open a web-browser to continue OAuth2 authorization

  • Method Details

    • handleRedirect

      Map<String,Object> handleRedirect(OAuth2 oauth2, String url) throws IOException
      Initialize a callback, which will require the user to open a web-browser to continue OAuth2 authorization
      Parameters:
      oauth2 - the OAuth2 object
      url - the URL to connect to for the initial authorization
      Returns:
      a Map containing the properties received at the "redirect_uri"
      Throws:
      IOException - if an IOException occurs
